think_procedure: First, I read the description of the knob. The knob 'cpu_tuple_cost' sets the planner's estimate of the cost of processing each row during a query. The default value is 0.01. There is no mention of any special values that would change the function of this knob, such as disabling a feature. Therefore, this knob does not have any special values and is not a 'special' knob.
